entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Stony Plain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:44 a.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 15.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Plain 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Temperature: 15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 33 %

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 19.
